name: Secret In Tower - 64x64
description:
This game is still not finished!

I'm sorry, it takes longer time than I thought it would.

Story:

In the legend, there's a secret treasure chest on top of the tower.
But since there're many monsters in it, everyone who got in was defeated.
Can you get the treasure chest in safe?

Introductions:

This is a roguelike game with a resolution of 64x64 pixels.
You can press F5 to scale the screen up to 4 times size.

Controls:

Arrow keys - move, select
Z key - confirm, attack(still not work in this version)
X key - cancel, open menu(still not work in this version)
F5 key - open video and audio settings

Finished functions:

◆ Maze generator
◆ Save/Load system
◆ Title screen
◆ Stats bar

Undone/In progress functions:

◆ Pause menu
◆ Battle system
◆ Monsters
◆ Characters
◆ Opening animation
◆ Ending animation
◆ Game Over screen
